Html:
Hi all,

 

I appear to have installed jHtmlArea correctly - all of the toolbar functions are visible and functional - but if I press ctrl+i or ctrl+b, my FireFox bookmarks folder opens. I am running FireFox version 7.0.1.

When I'm viewing the script in Chrome, those keyboard shortcuts apply italic and bold as intended.

There are no JavaScript errors in Firebug.

Is this a bug with the plugin?

 

Regards,

Duncan
